name: Flappy Egg
description:
Got some assets from Sonic Mania and used them to make a Flappy Bird clone starring the hard-boiled man himself. Eggdude's hurtboxes are not forgiving. I wanted to emulate the same pain the original game caused.

SPACE is used for flight and to restart.

BACKSPACE is used to close the game (why would you ever do this).

All done for educational purposes. Have fun!
